connect20/nfusionsolutions_productpricin.name: connect20/Nfusionsolutions_ProductPricing

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/nfusionsolutions_productpricin.description: This extension adds the capability in Magento to import product prices from nFusion Solutions' reliable, enterprise-class cloud platform for global financial data.
